Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean, Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: Bobkatevan
Reviews.Content: initially booked marriott downtown tempe overbooked hotel wouldnt mind moving marriott mile hotels location hotel offered shuttle free forth offered incentive agreed hotel clean nice lobby clean bed comfortable free breakfast incentive oatmeal hubby breakfast plate ham eggs potatoes etc lady shuttled forth downtown hotel nice staff encountered nice initially didnt incentives called hotel manager immediately resolved recommend hotel definitely stay location isnt convenient downtown courtyard offer shuttle deal five minute drive street downtown tempe fun

Reviews.Title: “Renovated Courtyard perfect for business travel”
Reviews.Author: Traveler4workandplay
Reviews.Content: renovated marriott courtyard provides excellent speed wifi throughout hotel free newly designed lobbybarrestaurant friendlier floorplan arent busy airport runs free shuttle pick mill ave near asu plenty restaurants bars

Reviews.Title: “Fine hotel but noise is a problem”
Reviews.Author: travelingbarb2-2
Reviews.Content: booked hotel night overseas flight comprised 14 hours flying time stopovers hotels shuttle leaves half hour morning airport morning convenient service complaints completely satisfactory breakfast barely slept extremely distressing north building rear 10 202 freeways happens curve noise loud nonstop night dont noisy facing south sleep insist doesnt freeway booked hotel prior trip im taking july hopes nights sleep

Reviews.Title: “A nice airport hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: PG32
Reviews.Content: stayed pretty phx airport hotelsand favorite lobby remodeled includes restaurant food quality expect breakfast service rate reasonable clean quieter neighboring hotels feels cleaner gym critique ac units bit loud fine free internet platinums maybe lower status staff extremely friendly helpful shuttle forth office airport mill ave restaurants free little wait comfortable business traveler hotel enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed (again) by Courtyard's "broadband" internet”

Reviews.Content: oh impossible hospitality industry understand pathetic excuse broadband internet unacceptable business travelers techie checking fire laptop start course propertys internet speed sorely lacking doesnt matter nice lcd television comfortable bedding fresh sparkling clean bathroom sets wrong foot attached photo understand painfully lacking speed courtyard phoenix airport courtyard couple tips stop embarrassing yourself labeling broadband secondly spend money provision real network infrastructure instead trying letting data ride aging voice lines guests cell phone 3x faster supposed broadband internet youve proven yourselves truly clueless

Reviews.Content: stayed night getting bumped flight marriott platinum considerate upgrade king suite bed pillows comfortable quiet airport noise typical close properties breakfast lobby restaurant service prompt courteous morning staff lot friendlier late night crew courteous pool nice hot tub fitness condition free wireless nice stay
